title: WTB: Bender - Trees or No Trees

posts.post_title: WTB: Bender - Trees or No Trees
posts.post_content:
Hey All - I am looking for a Bender, trees or no trees - in the 3-5 range.  Must have excellent centering, large borders, and a strong image.  No paper loss.

Please PM me with pictures and asking price!

Thanks!
